headline: BofA Positive on Trane Technologies (TT)
summary: Trane Technologies plc (NYSE:TT) is one of the best industrial stocks to buy. The upgrade follows the company’s skillful handling of the slowing residential demand in H2 2025 and the possible upside next […]

headline: Is NVIDIA’s (NVDA) $2 Billion Synopsys AI Partnership Reshaping Its Engineering Software Strategy?
summary: NVIDIA and Synopsys recently announced an expanded multiyear partnership to accelerate engineering software using NVIDIA AI and computing, alongside a US$2 billion NVIDIA investment in Synopsys and a slate of joint AI initiatives for industries such as semiconductors, automotive, and aerospace. This collaboration not only integrates advanced AI workflows and digital twin solutions into engineering software but also expands the reach of NVIDIA’s accelerated computing platforms across a broad...
